ComicInfo.Summary:
After the shocking turn of events at the Super Toyz store, the rest of the KIDZ come back home for a reprieve. Only to find Brooks alone, and Spielberg missing, with a bit of a fishy story. So Ben and Polly decide to do a little investigating of their own...
